prosecution-30052-1.name: WUDU
prosecution-30052-1.offence_description: Prosecution: The Defendant did not attend court and was convicted in their absence under s 196 of the Criminal Procedure Act 1986 NSW.
prosecution-30052-1.offence_nature: Food Safety Standard 3.2.2 Clause 6(1)(a). Failure to store the food in such a way that it is protected from the likelihood of contamination.

prosecution.decision: The Defendant did not attend court and was convicted in their absence under s 196 of the Criminal Procedure Act 1986 NSW.
prosecution.penalty_details_raw: $4000 for each offence. Total of $44,000 for eleven (11) offences. $2,083.00 in costs was awarded.
